snippet: The most recent flare-up in the long-running fight between the Yemeni Army and Shiite insurgents in the country’s north has killed hundreds of people in the past three weeks, local officials said Tuesday.
abstract: Long-running fight between the Yemeni Army and Shiite insurgents in the country's north leaves more than 500 people dead over two days.
lead_paragraph: The most recent flare-up in the long-running fight between the Yemeni Army and Shiite insurgents in the country’s north has killed hundreds of people in the past three weeks, local officials said Tuesday.
